svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Life expectancy vs. expected years lived with disability or disease burden,
Average life expectancy versus the expected number of years living with disability or disease burden. This figure represents the
difference between life expectancy and healthy life expectancy.
Expected years lived with disability or disease burden
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease
